alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:32AM CDT until July 24 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR EASTERN JO DAVIESS...NORTHERN CARROLL AND WESTERN STEPHENSON COUNTIES... At 132 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stockton, or 16 miles north of Mount Carroll, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lena, Stockton, Warren, Pearl City, Shannon, Woodbine, Apple River, Winslow, Nora, Massbach, Loran, Kent, Mississippi Palisades State Park, Waddams Grove, Eleroy, Canyon Camp, Lake Le-Aqua- na State Park, Mc Connell, Willow and Apple River Canyon State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
